item.title: Shell Scripting Tips
item.description: fff Can add the following function to the /usr/bin/fff, put them in the case key() {: Toggle executable flag. ${FFF_KEY_EXECUTABLE:=X}) [[ -f ${list[scroll]} && -w ${list[scroll]} ]] && { if [[ -x ${list[scroll]} ]]; then chmod -x "${list[scroll]}" status_line "Unset executable." else chmod +x "${list[scroll]}" status_line "Set executable." fi } ;; Open all Images ${FFF_IMAGE_OPEN:=I}) sxiv -ft * 2>/dev/null & status_line "Open all image in sxiv." ;; Extract files. ${FFF_EXTRACTION:=O}) ext "${list[scroll]}" > /dev/null 2>&1 open "$PWD" status_line "Extraction complete.
